# receiptCreationDate

**Type**

The date that the App Store signs a JSON Web Signature (JWS) app transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
timestamp receiptCreationDate
```

## Discussion

For more information, see [doc://com.apple.appstoreserverapi/documentation/AppStoreServerAPI/JWSAppTransactionDecodedPayload].

## JSON Web Signature (JWS) date

- **signedDate**: The UNIX time, in milliseconds, that the App Store signed the JSON Web Signature data.
